meanings.definition: Resembling a tumor in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The growth on the tree was tumorlike, causing concern for its health.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified a tumorlike mass during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The tumorlike shape of the cloud made it look like a giant cotton ball in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was tumorlike, slowly growing until it consumed her.
meanings.sent5: The tumorlike bump on the road made the car ride very bumpy.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to a tumor.
meanings.sent1: The abnormal cells showed a tumorlike growth pattern under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The tumorlike swelling on his arm was causing discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a tumorlike bulge in the middle, making it look quite odd.
meanings.sent4: The tumorlike behavior of the computer virus spread rapidly through the network.
meanings.sent5: The tumorlike mass of clothes in the corner needed to be sorted and put away.
